description:
Spyro the Dragon, originally released on the PS1 in 1998, is a 3D collectathon platform starring the titular
purple dragon, Spyro. Charge, jump, flame, and glide your way through 29 different levels across 6 different
homeworlds, as you collect gems, recover stolen dragon eggs, free crystallized dragons, and make your way
to Gnorc Gnexus to torch Gnasty and save the world of dragons.
name: Spyro the Dragon

spyro-v0.0.1.description:
Currently implemented features:
- Homeworld restrictions
- Portal locking
- Gnasty Gnorc goal

Known issues:
- Tuco can break logic
- Spyro color option has no safety checks
- Camera behaves weirdly for balloonist transition
- Portal shuffle doesn't do anything in-game yet, so seeds using it will likely be impossible to complete
spyro-v0.0.1.title: Initial playable alpha

spyro-v0.0.2.description:
New features:
- Generator will throw error for invalid spyro_color option, hopefully preventing filling slot data with game-crashing values
- Generator will throw errors for toggling options that will cause impossible seeds (because the options aren't working yet)
- Code is cleaned up behind the scenes
spyro-v0.0.2.title: Alpha 0.0.2

spyro-v0.1.0.description:
New features:
- Loot goal is implemented
- Vortex exits are locations

Known issues:
- Tuco can break logic
- Camera behaves weirdly in balloonist transitions
- Portal shuffle on will not generate (now you can't try to generate impossible seeds with it)

This version will be incompatible with existing worlds generated with previous versions.
spyro-v0.1.0.title: Alpha 0.1.0

spyro-v0.2.0.description:
New features:
- Tuco no longer offers to transport players to individual levels
- Locations have been added for every 500 total gems collected

Known issues:
- Camera behaves weirdly in balloonist transitions
- Portal shuffle on will not generate (now you can't try to generate impossible seeds with it)

This version will be incompatible with existing seeds
spyro-v0.2.0.title: Alpha 0.2.0

spyro-v0.2.1.description:
New features:
- Portal shuffle now works
- YAML-less UT support has been added
- Vortex locations should send almost immediately now

Known issues:
- Excluding levels doesn't affect the logic for total gem thresholds
- Camera behaves weirdly on balloonist transition

This version is most likely compatible with seeds from 0.2.0
spyro-v0.2.1.title: Alpha 0.2.1 - The Portal Shuffle update

spyro-v0.3.0.description:
New features:
- Goal level will be at vanilla location with portal shuffle on
- Fixes crash for players that played without portal shuffle on

Known issues:
- Excluding levels doesn't affect the logic for total gem thresholds
- Camera behaves weirdly on balloonist transition

This version will not work with older seeds
spyro-v0.3.0.title: Alpha 0.3.0 - Portal shuffle fixes

spyro-v0.3.1.description:
## What's Changed
* This release fixes an issue with the client throwing an error in Gnasty's World if portal shuffle was on.
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/gamefreq0/Archipelago/compare/spyro-v0.3.0...spyro-v0.3.1

 Compatible with existing v0.3.0 seeds
spyro-v0.3.1.title: Alpha 0.3.1 - Portal shuffle hotfix

spyro-v0.3.2.description:
## What's Changed
* Minimal in-game tracker added to inventory screen (first letter of homeworld or level name will be "." for locked, "!" for unlocked with unchecked locations, normal level name if unlocked and everything in the homeworld or level behind the portal has been done). This also affects the names on the portals, but unfortunately both "." and "!" show up as "'" there.
* Fix bug that broke patching for other games (hopefully)

This version should be compatible with v0.3.0 and v0.3.1 seeds.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/gamefreq0/Archipelago/compare/spyro-v0.3.1...spyro-v0.3.2
spyro-v0.3.2.title: spyro-v0.3.2

spyro-v0.3.3.description:
## What's Changed
- Prints client version when first connecting to AP
- Fixes client throwing error when connected to BizHawk before reaching title screen
- Make Spyro's color change apply under more circumstances
- Major code cleanup and refactoring of client code

Should theoretically be compatible with seeds from v0.3.0 through v0.3.2

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/gamefreq0/Archipelago/compare/spyro-v0.3.2...spyro-v0.3.3
spyro-v0.3.3.title: Spyro AP rando alpha v0.3.3 - The colorful update

spyro-v0.3.4.description:
## What's Changed
- Adds "random" as a valid spyro_color value
- Updates game info and setup docs
- Makes hints show corresponding entrance for portal shuffle


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/gamefreq0/Archipelago/compare/spyro-v0.3.3...spyro-v0.3.4
spyro-v0.3.4.title: Spyro AP rando alpha v0.3.4

spyro-v0.3.5.description:
## What's Changed
- Possibly fixes a bug that made Spyro the same color every time? (Not sure if the bug existed or I got unlucky in testing)
- Fixes an issue with a client error
- Updates the version number (for debugging)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/gamefreq0/Archipelago/compare/spyro-v0.3.4...spyro-v0.3.5
spyro-v0.3.5.title: spyro-v0.3.5

spyro-v0.4.0.description:
## What's Changed
- Adds dragons and eggs as locations
- Fixes a quit-to-menu bug
- Add options to reduce gem locations, both per-level and global

Will not work with older seeds

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/gamefreq0/Archipelago/compare/spyro-v0.3.5...spyro-v0.4.0
spyro-v0.4.0.title: spyro-v0.4.0

spyro-v0.4.1.description:
## What's Changed
- Fixed a bug that prevented generation with less than 100% of gem checks if portal shuffle was enabled


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/gamefreq0/Archipelago/compare/spyro-v0.4.0...spyro-v0.4.1
spyro-v0.4.1.title: spyro-v0.4.1
